Title: Verify product quantity in cart
Precondition: User is logged in and at least one product is already added to the cart
Steps:
1. Open the shopping cart page
2. Click  "Add to cart"
3.Click"Add to cart" again
Expected Result: Quantity of existing Product increases by 1 and total updates.
Actual Result: When clicking"Add to cart" again,  product added as a new item instead of increasing quantity
